description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Experience a classic 80's game that never existed, but should have!  Space Command explores what would happen if the enemy type from one classic game genre attacked the heroes from another genre.
description.short: Experience a classic 80's game that never existed, but should have!  Space Command explores what would happen if the enemy type from one classic game genre attacked the heroes from another genre.
